alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Garland and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 745 PM CST... At 714 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Norman, or near Mount Ida, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Mountain Pine... Norman... Lake Ouachita State Park... Mimosa... Avant... Black Springs... Crystal Springs Landing... Mt Tabor... Royal... Lena Landing Rec Area... Silver... Crystal Springs... Hurricane Grove... Caddo Gap... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for central and western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations
